Articles.Content:
Don't have time for a long post.

I installed DRE and nuFAR (Fanno) on top of a handful of other mods (realchutes, safechute, engineer, ambient light adjust, sciencealert, stagerecovery, stockbugfixmodules).

First reentry from a quick and short suborbital, the craft never slowed down through the atmosphere. It continued gaining speed until impacting the water at about 1700m/s. This was a craft with no engines or tanks, as they'd been staged off on the way up.

Also, performance was miserable, getting like 5 frames per second.

Mac OS X 10.10.3

3.4ghz i7-3770, 8GB

GTX 675MX 1GB

Removed FAR and DRE, performance back to normal.
Moved from the FAR thread. Please follow the steps in the sticky and we'll be able to help.

This is a known issue with DRE. I think you have to update your ModuleFlightIntegrator.

See this post
